Package org.opensha2.gmm

Provides implementations of all GroundMotionModels used in the 2008 and 2014 USGS National Seismic Hazard Models.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConvertsMag
    Implemented by ground motion models (GMMs) that perform a magnitude conversion prior to using the value.
    GroundMotionModel
    Interface implemented by all ground motion models (GMMs); these are also commonly referred to as ground motion prediction equations (GMPEs) or attenuation relationships.
    ScalarGroundMotion
    Ground motion model (Gmm) result container.

Package org.opensha2.gmm Description

Provides implementations of all GroundMotionModels used in the 2008 and 2014 USGS National Seismic Hazard Models.

Most of the model implementations in this package may not be instantiated directly. Rather, instances of each are/should be obtained via Gmm.instance(Imt). The various models are exposed publicly for the sake of documentation. In many cases, the public implementations are abstract, and there are a variety of model flavors that are available via the Gmm enum.
